body_html: This doesn't seem to solve the issue. The real problem is that we apparently have a different resolution depending on the number of steps (even steps=no problems, odd_steps=problem). It looks like the presence of "0.0" mess up something. This doesn't happen with the previous version of pytorch (0.3). Are you able to reproduce the error from the code posted above?
